summary: Implemented Supervisor Core (Milestone 2) with start/stop/status/restart commands. The supervisor manages Takopi and Smithers subprocesses, monitors health via SQLite heartbeat, sends periodic Telegram status updates, and implements auto-restart with exponential backoff. All tests passing (21 pass, 1 skip).
testOutput: 21 pass, 1 skip, 0 fail, 52 expect() calls across 22 tests in 7 files
